SEARCH
Package project.testmaster.backend.service

Class QuestionService

java.lang.Object
project.testmaster.backend.service.QuestionService
@Service public class QuestionService extends Object
Service class for managing operations related to Question entities. This service encapsulates business logic for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting questions. It interacts with the underlying persistence layer through the QuestionRepository to perform these operations. It supports the following functionalities: - Creating a new question with associated metadata - Retrieving a question by its unique identifier - Deleting a question by its unique identifier - Updating an existing question The service leverages dependency injection to interact with the QuestionRepository.

  • Constructor Details

    • QuestionService

      public QuestionService(QuestionRepository questionRepository)
      Constructs a new instance of the QuestionService with the provided QuestionRepository. The QuestionRepository is used as a dependency to perform CRUD operations on the Question entity. This constructor leverages dependency injection to obtain the required repository implementation.
      Parameters:
      questionRepository - the repository used for question persistence operations

  • Method Details

    • createQuestion

      public Question createQuestion(Teacher teacher, Question.QuestionType type, String content, String[] mediaUrl, String[] options, String answer)
      Creates a new question and stores it in the repository.
      Parameters:
      teacher - the teacher who is creating the question
      type - the type of the question (e.g., multiple choice, short answer)
      content - the content or body of the question
      mediaUrl - array of URLs linking to associated media for the question
      options - array of possible options for the question if applicable
      answer - the correct answer to the question
      Returns:
      the created and saved Question object

    • getQuestionById

      public Question getQuestionById(UUID id)
      Retrieves a Question by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the Question to retrieve
      Returns:
      the Question associated with the specified ID, or null if no Question is found

    • deleteQuestion

      public void deleteQuestion(UUID id)
      Deletes a question with the specified unique identifier from the repository.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the question to be deleted

    • updateQuestion

      public Question updateQuestion(Question question)
      Updates an existing question in the database.
      Parameters:
      question - the Question object containing updated data to be persisted
      Returns:
      the updated Question object after saving in the database
